entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:03 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
